name: KAijU (itch)
description:
~MAXIMIZE TO PLAY~

Artist Statement - 

In this game, you play as a mighty Kaiju! You can move around, break down buildings, and breathe fire. I had wanted to add a way for the player to gradually add buildings and create a city that they can then destroy. Thinking about the way children enjoy building something to then destroy it. I think this game holds the potential for an interesting experience where the player creates something knowing it will be destroyed. For future development, I would like to see a balance between the creating and destruction stage. I want the player to feel enjoyment during the destruction stage otherwise it could be a sad experience.
